Question
========

John and Martijn play a game together: Martijn rolls a pure die. John must pay to him in the following situations: \ 5 cents if there are one or two eyes above,‗. 10 cents if there are three or four pips on top,‖ and 20 cents if there are 5 eyes above, and 40 cents if there are 6 eyes above,‖ and \ How many cents should Martin pay John before each game begins so that it is an *equitable* game?

Answerlist
----------

* 5
* 15
* 20
* 25
* 30

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 5: Incorrect
* 15: Correct
* 20: Incorrect
* 25: Incorrect
* 30: Incorrect
